person.persName: Wright Nichols, Jr. (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky, native. Son of Wright Nichols, Sr., and Sally Louisa Nichols. Married to Jane J. Martin Nichols. Father of Ann Nichols, Virginia Nichols, and James Wright Nichols. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed William Littlefield as a farm laborer in in Caldwell County in 1860.
